name: fun Run race stick 3d
description:
Best Free Fun Run Parkour Race 3D Game with amazing running music

Fun Run Parkour Race 3D is a new mobile game with new running parkour features
Get the real parkour experience by competing with other runners in a long , but funny Parkour 3D race
Increase your ranking best ranking by beating your opponents, Unlock and customize your Fun Run 3D characters

Fun Run Parkour Race 3D is an endless running game with more characters to choose your best liked runner.
Jump from Tower to wall, climb Colorful ropes, swipe and Run faster, Swing in the Maze jump higher, grab to Rotate, use bars to keep from falling out and Escape from hole.

Fun Human Race is a 3D arcade game where you can run fastly
and fall the winner of a 3D human touch race.


Game Features :
Tap to jump and twice for double jump
Fun kid racing characters
Amazing Race 3D levels
Jump from wall to wall and run to race
Climb ropes, slide to get faster race
Flip to jump higher and grab to swing
Choose your favorite character
Compete with others and get the highest ranking
